original: 許劭「外慕聲名，內非真正，待吾雖厚，其勢必薄。」招募趙昱、張昭未成即威迫；縱容笮融掠民資與施行暴政。
text: Xu Shao "the reputation of admiration on the outside, not true on the inside, although I am thick, it is bound to be weak." Recruiting Zhao Yu and Zhang Zhao is coercive before they succeed; conniving Ruo Rong to plunder private capital and impose tyranny.
